excerpt.rendered:
• 16 channels and 1 HDD DVR
  • Efficient H.265 pro+ compression technology
  • Encoding ability up to 1080p @ 15 fps
  • 5 signals input adaptively (HDTVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS/IP)
